trans-unit.source: Represents a statement that consists of a single expression.
trans-unit.target: 表示陳述式所組成的單一運算式。

trans-unit.source: A CodeExpressionStatement contains a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression> object, and it can be added to a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection> object, allowing some expressions to stand alone.
trans-unit.target: 包含 CodeExpressionStatement<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>物件中，並可以加入至<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection>物件，讓獨立的某些運算式。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeStatementCollection> </xref:System.CodeDom.CodeExpression>

trans-unit.source: For example, a <xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression> contained by a CodeExpressionStatement can represent a method call without a return value.
trans-unit.target: 例如，<xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression>所包含 CodeExpressionStatement 可以代表的方法呼叫不傳回任何值。</xref:System.CodeDom.CodeMethodInvokeExpression>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement"></xref>類別。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement"></xref> class by using the specified expression.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新執行個體<xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpressionStatement"></xref>類別使用指定的運算式。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the expression for the statement.
trans-unit.target: 取得或設定陳述式的運算式。

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"></xref> that indicates the expression for the statement.
trans-unit.target: A <xref href="System.CodeDom.CodeExpression"> </xref>指出陳述式的運算式。
